verses.roman:
kāśīśvara govindādi yata bhakta-gaṇa
hātāhāti kari' haila dvitīya āvaraṇa

synonyms: kāśīśvara—Kāśīśvara; govinda-ādi—headed by Govinda; yata—all; bhakta-gaṇa—devotees; hātāhāti—linked hand to hand; kari'-doing; haila—became; dvitīya—a second; āvaraṇa—covering circle.
translation: All the devotees headed by Kāśīśvara and Govinda linked hands and formed a second circle around the Lord.
